description:
Salomon’s S/LAB MTN Summit strikes the perfect balance between the lightness needed to effortlessly go up, and the reliable performance required to ski down. The micro-adjustable BOA® Fit System combined with a strategically placed ankle strap creates Salomon’s innovative Touring Belt, for a customized fit and unbeatable heel-hold. The ultra-light Ultramid® Shell, 70 mm wide Dual Powerstrap and thin liner deliver the precise calf-wrapping and consistent tightness needed to conquer even the most extreme routes.

  • Custom Shell HD is heat-mouldable to provide the best fit possible
  • Carbon fibre spine is rigid to allow a wide range of motion and forward flex
  • Micro-adjustable BOA® Fit System for a customized fit and unbeatable heel-hold
  • Wide 75° range of motion of allows for more effective climbing even on the steepest ascents
  • Textile cover on lower tongue saves weight and adds comfort in walk mode
  • My Customfit 3D Freeride liner is ultralight and thermoformable
  • Surelock ski/walk mechanism has metal on metal locking system for reliable support
  • Contagrip sole provides grip and the rockered sole allows a natural walking motion
name: Salomon S/Lab MTN Summit Ski Boots - Men's
